description.original: Automatically creates virtual links for text within your notes that match the titles or aliases of other notes in your vault. Create a glossary-like functionality, show unlinked mentions and transform them to real links.
description.translation: Automatically creates virtual links for text within your notes that match the titles or aliases of other notes in your vault. Create a glossary-like functionality, show unlinked mentions and transform them to real links.

dict..error(\"[VL LC] Error filtering aliases: .error("[VL LC] Error filtering aliases", aliases, e)
dict..error(\"[VL LC] Error adding file to tr: .error("[VL LC] Error adding file to tree", file, e)
dict.name: \"Convert All Virtual Links in Sel: name: "Convert All Virtual Links in Selection to Real Links"
dict..setName(\"Capital letter percentage for: .setName("Capital letter percentage for automatic match case")
dict..setDesc(\"If activated, the virtual lin: .setDesc("If activated, the virtual linker will also include aliases for the files.")
dict..setDesc(\"If activated, there will not: .setDesc("If activated, there will not be several identical virtual links in the same note (Wikipedia style).")
dict..setDesc(\"If activated, there will be n: .setDesc("If activated, there will be no links to files that are already linked in the note by real links.")
dict..setDesc(\"If activated, headers (so you: .setDesc("If activated, headers (so your lines beginning with at least one `#`) are included for virtual links.")
dict..setDesc(\"If deactivated, only whole wo: .setDesc("If deactivated, only whole words are matched. Otherwise, every part of a word is found.")
dict..setDesc(\"If activated, the beginnings: .setDesc("If activated, the beginnings of words are also linked, even if it is not a whole match.")
dict..setDesc(\"If activated, the ends of wor: .setDesc("If activated, the ends of words are also linked, even if it is not a whole match.")
dict..setDesc(\"If activated, the suffix is n: .setDesc("If activated, the suffix is not added to links for subwords, but only for complete matches.")
dict..setDesc(\"If activated, there will be n: .setDesc("If activated, there will be no links in the current line.")
dict..setDesc(\"If activated, the matching is: .setDesc("If activated, the matching is case sensitive.")
dict..setDesc(\"The percentage (0 - 100) of c: .setDesc("The percentage (0 - 100) of capital letters in a file name or alias to be automatically considered as case sensitive.")
dict..setDesc(\"By adding this tag to a file,: .setDesc("By adding this tag to a file, the linker will ignore the case for the file.")
.setDesc("By adding this tag to a file, the linker will match the case for the file.")
dict..setDesc(\"By adding this property to a: .setDesc("By adding this property to a note, containing a list of names, the linker will ignore the case for the specified names / aliases. This way you can decide, which alias should be insensitive.")

.setDesc("By adding this property to a note, containing a list of names, the linker will match the case for the specified names / aliases. This way you can decide, which alias should be case sensitive.")
dict..setDesc(\"Include all files for the vir: .setDesc("Include all files for the virtual linker.")
dict..setDesc(\"Directories to include for th: .setDesc("Directories to include for the virtual linker (separated by new lines).")
dict..setDesc(\"Directories from which files: .setDesc("Directories from which files are to be excluded for the virtual linker (separated by new lines). Files in these directories will not create any virtual links in other files.")
dict..setDesc(\"Tag to explicitly include the: .setDesc("Tag to explicitly include the file for the linker.")
dict..setDesc(\"Tag to ignore the file for th: .setDesc("Tag to ignore the file for the linker.")
dict..setDesc(\"If toggled, links to the note: .setDesc("If toggled, links to the note itself are excluded from the linker. (This might not work in preview windows.)")
dict..setDesc(\"Directories in which the plug: .setDesc("Directories in which the plugin will not create virtual links (separated by new lines).")
dict..setDesc(\"If toggled, if there are mult: .setDesc("If toggled, if there are multiple matching notes, all references are shown behind the match. If not toggled, the references are only shown if hovering over the match.")
dict..setDesc(\"The suffix to add to auto gen: .setDesc("The suffix to add to auto generated virtual links.")
.setDesc("The suffix to add to auto generated virtual links for aliases.")
dict..setDesc(\"If toggled, the default link: .setDesc("If toggled, the default link styling will be applied to virtual links. Furthermore, you can style the links yourself with a CSS-snippet affecting the class `virtual-link`. (Find the CSS snippet directory at Appearance -> CSS Snippets -> Open snippets folder)")
.setDesc("If toggled, the default link style will be used for the conversion of virtual links to real links.")
dict..setDesc(\"If toggled, the virtual links: .setDesc("If toggled, the virtual links will be created as wiki-links instead of markdown links.")
dict..setPlaceholder(\"List of directory name: .setPlaceholder("List of directory names (separated by new line)")
dict..setTitle(\"[Virtual Linker] Converting: .setTitle("[Virtual Linker] Converting link is not here.")
